page.title: 17Retreat Boatyard
page.content: The Retreat Boatyard is on Topsham road, one mile from Topsham. There is nearby a large house called Retreat House but this is not conected now with the boatyard. The site of the boatyard was once used as stables and courtyard for Retreat House. The yard has been working for about 15 years. The company does not build boats but aims to provide a yard where yachts up to 40 feet in length and 10 tonnes in wieght can be moored. The yard has facilties for storage, lifting of boats out of the water, fitting ou and repair of glass fibre and wooden boats. A 33 feet yacht currently employs 11 full time and 4 part time workers
